Test Procedure: Run the GenAI model with sample EHR inputs.
Condition to be tested: Check if the model generates meaningful and structured clinical notes.

Test Procedure: Convert sample diagnoses into ICD-10 codes using automated coding.
Condition to be tested: Verify correct mapping for each diagnosis.
Expected Result: Accurate and valid ICD-10 code assignment.

Test Procedure: Combine generated clinical notes with ICD-10 codes.
Condition to be tested: Ensure both appear together in the final output.
Expected Result: Unified output containing notes and codes.

Test Procedure: Load the output in the frontend interface.
Condition to be tested: Confirm UI renders all sections without errors.

Test Procedure: Test complete workflow from input to final integrated output.
Condition to be tested: Ensure models and modules work smoothly in sequence.
